reviewText: My wife and I love this performance and especially like Colm and Patti LaPone in all arenas in which they perform. I just wish that we could get this exact performance in a Hi Definition DVD !! All of my searches on the Internet have not revealed a source . . .

the dvd is defective and will not play. I tried it on three different dvd players. I was going to return it, but I have had it over
30 days and I am not sure you will exchange it.
the dvd didn't work it said there was no playback so i didn't get to watch the dvd of  colm wilkinson hit west musicial dvd
Another amazing production showcasing Colm Wilkinson.  Due to the format I am only able to watch in on my PC.  Doesn't matter it's still amazing!
Vraiment trs bon, je le recommande fortement. Colm Wilkinson nous offre un trs bon show ou l`on peut apprcier toute la richesse de sa voix unique.
